---
Help: Use to select Export Transportation details
---
!|Script      |Ui                                                                                                                                                                                                                            |
|$containers= |getHeaderColumnNumber;                                                                                                                |//div[contains(@class,'el-table__header')]//th/div[@class='cell']|xpath |Container Type|
|click;       |(//div[contains(@class,'el-table__header')]/following-sibling::div[contains(@class,'el-table__body')]//tr)[1]//td[$containers]//input |xpath                                                                                  |
|sendKeys;    |(//div[contains(@class,'el-table__header')]/following-sibling::div[contains(@class,'el-table__body')]//tr)[1]//td[$containers]//input |xpath                                                            |${container_name}    |
|click;       |//li//span[contains(text(),'${container_name}')]                                                                                      |xpath                                                                                  |
|$pickup=     |getHeaderColumnNumber;                                                                                                                |//div[contains(@class,'el-table__header')]//th/div[@class='cell']|xpath |Pickup        |
|click;       |(//div[contains(@class,'el-table__header')]/following-sibling::div[contains(@class,'el-table__body')]//tr)[1]//td[$pickup]//input     |xpath                                                                                  |
|click;       |//li/span[contains(text(),'${gate_name1}')]                                                                                           |xpath                                                                                  |
|$vehicles=   |getHeaderColumnNumber;                                                                                                                |//div[contains(@class,'el-table__header')]//th/div[@class='cell']|xpath |Vehicle Type  |
|click;       |(//div[contains(@class,'el-table__header')]/following-sibling::div[contains(@class,'el-table__body')]//tr)[1]//td[$vehicles]//input   |xpath                                                                                  |
|sendKeys;    |(//div[contains(@class,'el-table__header')]/following-sibling::div[contains(@class,'el-table__body')]//tr)[1]//td[$vehicles]//input   |xpath                                                            |${vehicle_name}      |
|click;       |//li//span[contains(text(),'${vehicle_name}')]                                                                                        |xpath                                                                                  |
|$transporter=|getHeaderColumnNumber;                                                                                                                |//div[contains(@class,'el-table__header')]//th/div[@class='cell']|xpath |Transporter   |
|click;       |(//div[contains(@class,'el-table__header')]/following-sibling::div[contains(@class,'el-table__body')]//tr)[1]//td[$transporter]//input|xpath                                                                                  |
|sendKeys;    |(//div[contains(@class,'el-table__header')]/following-sibling::div[contains(@class,'el-table__body')]//tr)[1]//td[$transporter]//input|xpath                                                            |${transporter_ref_id}|
|click;       |//li//span[contains(text(),'${transporter_ref_id}')]                                                                                  |xpath                                                                                  |
